quest.name: My First Chaser Hammer
journal: Serendipity would like to officially begin your training as a goldsmith.
For your first lesson, the guildmaster bids you craft for her a single copper ingot. If needed, you may purchase the copper ore from Aistan, though wind shards must be obtained elsewhere.

Although Serendipity is pleased with your copper ingot, her assistant, Gigi, declares it unfit to bear night soil. Nevertheless, the guildmaster declares that you have talent, and that you should return once you have gained more experience.

※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 5.
objectives: Deliver a copper ingot to Serendipity.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Great, let's get started! Though to be honest, I'd swear you've done this before by the way you wear that hammer on your hip.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Mind you, even if you do have some experience, a responsible guildmaster must ensure that her charges have a firm grasp of the fundamentals. Therefore, I command you to craft me a copper ingot!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: It's simple, really─all you need is copper ore and a wind shard.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Our guild supplier, Aistan, can supply you with copper ore. And I gave you a few wind shards along with your hammer. At least, I think I did. If it turns out you don't have any, you'll need to get some yourself.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Isn't this exciting, Forename? Your first real challenge as a member of the Goldsmiths' Guild! Show me the ingot when you're done. Good luck!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To synthesize a copper ingot for Serendipity, select Logs from the main menu, followed by Crafting Log.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: A farewell to cut tags.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh, did you forget what materials you need? Aistan over there can sell you copper ore, but I'm afraid he doesn't stock wind shards. Don't think too hard, Forename. Just give it a try and see what happens!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Hmmm... You know, I think this is quite─

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text:
NE※GIGIGI★※...
GIGIGI☆...BZZZT.

dialogue.name: GIGI
dialogue.text: UtTeR gArBaGe. ThE wOrSt. NoT eVeN fIt FoR mAkInG a ChAmBeR pOt.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Quiet, Gigi! I'm the guildmaster. I get to decide what's fit for a chamber pot!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Ahem, please excuse me! He gets a bit overzealous at times.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Gigi is my assistant, but he has a habit of butting in with his opinions.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Most mammets are rather simple, capable of no more than rudimentary speech. They can be relied upon for menial tasks, but little else.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Gigi, on the other hand, is quite intelligent. And quite stubborn, I might add.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I suspect that's due to his age. He's been with the guild for an eternity, ever attending each guildmaster. But recently, he's been coming and going as he pleases.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text:
NE※GIGIGI★※...
KnEeL bEfOrE GiGi, ThE oNe TrUe GuIlDmAsTeR. rEsPeCt My AuThOrItY, iGnOrAnT mOrTaL, oR sUfFeR mY wRaTh!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: <sigh> It's like this every day, Forename. I'm afraid the experience he's accumulated over a century of assisting guildmasters has made him arrogant.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: It's quite intimidating, really. I may be the guildmaster, but he's like a walking, talking archive of all knowledge to do with our craft.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh! I completely forgot about your ingot! Sorry, sorry...

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: As I was about to say, I think this is very, very good for a beginner! It's reasonably pure and well formed.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I daresay you've got a knack for this, Forename. What you need now is practice.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: So keep practicing with your hammer, and come back here when you've gotten more comfortable using it.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text:

BuGgEr OfF, gReEnHoRn.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 5.
